Class StoreFront

java.lang.Object
app.StoreFront
public class StoreFront extends Object
handles purchasing SalableProducts from an InventoryManager

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StoreFront()
    constructs a StoreFront with a blank InventoryManager
    StoreFront(ArrayList<SalableProduct> products)
    constructs a StoreFront with a given InventoryManager
